title: 2 fonts for Robert Plant
content:
hi to all  
someone can help me to identify this 2 fonts? I think that ROBERT PLANT is ARSIS font  
but for NINE LIVES someone have an idea?  
thanx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234709im_/http:/typophile.com/files/plant_5749.jpg)

 [‹ ID needed](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234709/http:/typophile.com/node/40018 "Go to previous forum topic") [Playful serif face ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234709/http:/typophile.com/node/39981 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rockberto

comments.content:
the second font is Bickham Script

thanx to all

<cite>the second font is Bickham Script</cite>

Yes, the font with myriads of contextual alternates, ligatures and kerning pairs …  
How did the saying go? “Anyone who would letterspace sheep would steal script” … No?

Florian - I LOVE IT!!!

But I think in today’s computer age, anyone who letterspaces a script font - probably got it from a pdf without any kerning.... LOL

interesting to see that Onyx and Bickham Script are not the fonts from the actual boxed set

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234709im_/http:/typophile.com/files/375x375_4995.jpg)
